alert.note: Alert for Eureka; Lander (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued April 16 at 6:05PM PDT until April 16 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: The National Weather Service in Elko Nevada has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... East central Lander County in north central Nevada... West central Eureka County in north central Nevada... * Until 700 PM PDT. * At 604 PM PDT, a dust channel was 27 miles northwest of Grass Valley, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Satellite Indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel along SR 305, 306, and 278. Locations impacted include... Grass Valley, Antelope Valley and Mount Tenabo. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
